titleStmt.title: A true relation of the transactions between Sir Charls Coot Kt. Lord President of Connaught in Ireland, and Owen-Roe-O-Neal; as it was reported to the Parliament from the Councel of State. Together with the votes of the House thereupon. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that these several letters and articles, together with the votes of the House thereupon, be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, cleric. Parliamenti.

A true relation of the transactions between Sir Charls Coot Kt. Lord President of Connaught in Ireland, and Owen-Roe-O-Neal; as it was reported to the Parliament from the Councel of State. Together with the votes of the House thereupon. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that these several letters and articles, together with the votes of the House thereupon, be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: Mountrath, Charles Coote, Earl of, ca. 1610-1661.
O'Neill, Owen Roe, 1590?-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
